question: Indian shooter Shreyasi Singh won the women's double trap gold by scoring __________ points at the 21st Commonwealth Games 2018.
explanation: Indian shooter Shreyasi Singh won the women's double trap gold in a shoot-off after scoring 96 points to take India's gold medal tally at the 21st Commonwealth Games 2018 to 12. This was her second CWG medal after having claimed a silver at the 2014 Glasgow Games. Another Indian shooter Varsha Varman finished fourth in the event, scoring 86 points.
